name: Generic Script File
summary: Learn about .SCRIPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Common scripting languages include JavaScript (.JS), VBScript (.VBS), AppleScript (.SCPT), PHP (.PHP), and ASP (.ASP). Script files can typically be opened and edited with a text editor. In order to execute a script, the file extension may need to be changed to the scripting language's default extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
